A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie has been written and directed so bad that had betrayed the continuity of Star Wars legacy and destroyed the hope and faith of the Star Wars audiences to continue their imagination and connection to the legendary heroes. The only way to save the Star Wars saga is to change this movie name to \"Star Wars: The Last Jedi-Parallel Universe\" and announce by Disney that the episode 9 will be the true sequel of episode 7.
